nars.inference
Class MatchingRules

java.lang.Object
  nars.inference.MatchingRules

public final class MatchingRules
extends java.lang.Object

Directly process a task by a oldBelief, with only two Terms in both. In matching, the new task is compared with all existing direct Tasks in that Concept, to carry out:

revision: between judgments on non-overlapping evidence; revision: between judgments; satisfy: between a Judgment and a Question/Goal; merge: between items of the same type and stamp; conversion: between different inheritance relations.
